Review_Text: An excellent meditative, highly witty (as you'd expect!) look at what it means to be of Irish descent living in England. As a Scotsman who has spent time living in England, many of the issues resonated strongly - feeling like an outsider, like a lower class of human. The narrator's do a great job of posting the pertinent questions for the viewer to answer for themselves. These are strange times we live in - this movie shines a subtle light on what England voting to exclude itself (and the rest of the UK) from the EU means for its constituent and neighbouring nations, and what impact it has on people from these neighbouring nations who now live in England but feel alien.
